amendment.description: To establish a digital and wireless network technology program, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5143 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5143 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S10904) To establish a digital and wireless network technology program, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5143 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Allen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5143 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
